title: The 4-Hour Workweek: Escape 9-5, Live Anywhere, and Join the New Rich - Expanded and Updated
author: Timothy Ferriss

highlights.representative_text: NR:To be neither the boss nor the employee, but the owner. To own the trains and have someone else ensure they run on time.
highlights.selected_text: To be neither the boss nor the employee, but the owner. To own the trains and have someone else ensure they run on time.

highlights.representative_text: The employee who rearranges his schedule and negotiates a remote work agreement to achieve 90% of the results in one-tenth of the time, which frees him to practice cross-country skiing and take road trips with his family two weeks per month. The business owner who eliminates the least profitable customers and projects, outsources all operations entirely, and travels the world collecting rare documents, all while working remotely on a website to showcase her own illustration work. The student who elects to risk it all--which is nothing--to establish an online video rental service that delivers $5,000 per month in income from a small niche of Blu-ray aficionados, a two-hour-per-week side project that allows him to work full-time as an animal rights lobbyist.
highlights.selected_text: The employee who rearranges his schedule and negotiates a remote work agreement to achieve 90% of the results in one-tenth of the time, which frees him to practice cross-country skiing and take road trips with his family two weeks per month. The business owner who eliminates the least profitable customers and projects, outsources all operations entirely, and travels the world collecting rare documents, all while working remotely on a website to showcase her own illustration work. The student who elects to risk it all--which is nothing--to establish an online video rental service that delivers $5,000 per month in income from a small niche of Blu-ray aficionados, a two-hour-per-week side project that allows him to work full-time as an animal rights lobbyist

highlights.representative_text: NR:To distribute recovery periods and adventures (mini-retirements) throughout life on a regular basis and recognize that inactivity is not the goal. Doing that which excites you is.
highlights.selected_text: To distribute recovery periods and adventures (mini-retirements) throughout life on a regular basis and recognize that inactivity is not the goal. Doing that which excites you is.

highlights.representative_text: Most people will never be able to retire and maintain even a hotdogs-for-dinner standard of living.
highlights.selected_text: Most people will never be able to retire and maintain even a hotdogs-for-dinner standard of living

highlights.representative_text: It is predicated on the assumption that you dislike what you are doing during the most physically capable years of your life.
highlights.selected_text: It is predicated on the assumption that you dislike what you are doing during the most physically capable years of your life

highlights.representative_text: If the math does work, it means that you are one ambitious, hardworking machine. If that's the case, guess what? One week into retirement, you'll be so damn bored that you'll want to stick bicycle spokes in your eyes. You'll probably opt to look for a new job or start another company. Kinda defeats the purpose of waiting, doesn't it?
highlights.selected_text: If the math does work, it means that you are one ambitious, hardworking machine. If that's the case, guess what? One week into retirement, you'll be so damn bored that you'll want to stick bicycle spokes in your eyes. You'll probably opt to look for a new job or start another company. Kinda defeats the purpose of waiting, doesn't it?

highlights.representative_text: If the recipe sucks, it doesn't matter how good a cook you are.
highlights.selected_text: If the recipe sucks, it doesn't matter how good a cook you are.

highlights.representative_text: Doing less meaningless work, so that you can focus on things of greater personal importance, is NOT laziness.
highlights.selected_text: Doing less meaningless work, so that you can focus on things of greater personal importance, is NOT laziness.

highlights.representative_text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
highlights.selected_text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.

highlights.representative_text: By working only when you are most effective, life is both more productive and more enjoyable. It's the perfect example of having your cake and eating it, too.
highlights.selected_text: By working only when you are most effective, life is both more productive and more enjoyable. It's the perfect example of having your cake and eating it, too.

highlights.representative_text: Lifestyle Design is thus not interested in creating an excess of idle time, which is poisonous, but the positive use of free time, defined simply as doing what you want as opposed to what you feel obligated to do.
highlights.selected_text: positive use of free time, defined simply as doing what you want as opposed to what you feel obligated to do.

highlights.representative_text: It is far more lucrative and fun to leverage your strengths instead of attempting to fix all the chinks in your armor.
highlights.selected_text: It is far more lucrative and fun to leverage your strengths instead of attempting to fix all the chinks in your armor.

highlights.representative_text: Focus on better use of your best weapons instead of constant repair.
highlights.selected_text: Focus on better use of your best weapons instead of constant repair.

highlights.representative_text: If it isn't going to devastate those around you, try it and then justify it.
highlights.selected_text: try it and then justify it.

highlights.representative_text: Get good at being a troublemaker and saying sorry when you really screw up.
highlights.selected_text: Get good at being a troublemaker and saying sorry when you really screw up.

highlights.representative_text: The NR, despite fewer hours in the office, produce more meaningful results than the next dozen non-NR combined.
highlights.selected_text: The NR, despite fewer hours in the office, produce more meaningful results than the next dozen non-NR combined.

highlights.representative_text: If you telescope out 10 years and know with 100% certainty that it is a path of disappointment and regret, and if we define risk as "the likelihood of an irreversible negative outcome," inaction is the greatest risk of all.
highlights.selected_text: inaction is the greatest risk of all

highlights.representative_text: Most people will choose unhappiness over uncertainty.
highlights.selected_text: Most people will choose unhappiness over uncertainty.

highlights.representative_text: In other words, I was risking an unlikely and temporary 3 or 4 for a probable and permanent 9 or 10, and I could easily recover my baseline workaholic prison with a bit of extra work if I wanted to.
highlights.selected_text: In other words, I was risking an unlikely and temporary 3 or 4 for a probable and permanent 9 or 10, and I could easily recover my baseline workaholic prison with a bit of extra work if I wanted to

highlights.representative_text: Relative income uses two variables: the dollar and time, usually hours.
highlights.selected_text: Relative income uses two variables: the dollar and time, usually hours

highlights.representative_text: I'll repeat something you might consider tattooing on your forehead: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
highlights.selected_text: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do

highlights.representative_text: Don't save it all for the end. There is every reason not to.
highlights.selected_text: Don't save it all for the end. There is every reason not to.

highlights.representative_text: None of these things would be fatal--not even close.
highlights.selected_text: None of these things would be fatal--not even close
highlights.note: Imagine the worst that could happen if u face fear..

highlights.representative_text: The New Rich are equally aggressive in removing distress and finding eustress.
highlights.selected_text: The New Rich are equally aggressive in removing distress and finding eustress.

highlights.representative_text: Living like a millionaire requires doing interesting things and not just owning enviable things.
highlights.selected_text: Living like a millionaire requires doing interesting things and not just owning enviable things

highlights.representative_text: I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened.
highlights.selected_text: I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened.

highlights.representative_text: Life is too short to be small.
highlights.selected_text: Life is too short to be small.

highlights.representative_text: That phone call, that conversation, whatever the action might be--it is fear of unknown outcomes that prevents us from doing what we need to do. Define the worst case, accept it, and do it.
highlights.selected_text: it is fear of unknown outcomes that prevents us from doing what we need to do. Define the worst case, accept it, and do it.

highlights.representative_text: For nearly five years, he had faced his alarm clock with the same dread: I have to do this for another 40-45 years?
highlights.selected_text: For nearly five years, he had faced his alarm clock with the same dread: I have to do this for another 40-45 years?

highlights.representative_text: It is equally important to measure the atrocious cost of inaction. If you don't pursue those things that excite you, where will you be in one year, five years, and ten years?
highlights.selected_text: It is equally important to measure the atrocious cost of inaction. If you don't pursue those things that excite you, where will you be in one year, five years, and ten years?

highlights.representative_text: Even if you work 10 hours a week and produce twice the results of people working 40, the collective request will be, "Work 40 hours a week and produce 8 times the results." This is an endless game and one you want to avoid. Hence the need for Liberation first.
highlights.selected_text: Work 40 hours a week and produce 8 times the results." This is an endless game and one you want to avoid. Hence the need for Liberation first.

highlights.representative_text: Believe it or not, it is not only possible to accomplish more by doing less, it is mandatory. Enter the world of elimination.
highlights.selected_text: Believe it or not, it is not only possible to accomplish more by doing less, it is mandatory. Enter the world of elimination.

highlights.representative_text: Tomorrow becomes never. No matter how small the task, take the first step now!
highlights.selected_text: Tomorrow becomes never. No matter how small the task, take the first step now!

highlights.representative_text: Of course, before you can separate the wheat from the chaff and eliminate activities in a new environment (whether a new job or an entrepreneurial venture), you will need to try a lot to identify what pulls the most weight. Throw it all up on the wall and see what sticks.
highlights.selected_text: you will need to try a lot to identify what pulls the most weight. Throw it all up on the wall and see what sticks

highlights.representative_text: It's easy to get caught in a flood of minutiae, and the key to not feeling rushed is remembering that lack of time is actually lack of priorities.
highlights.selected_text: It's easy to get caught in a flood of minutiae, and the key to not feeling rushed is remembering that lack of time is actually lack of priorities

highlights.representative_text: Pareto's Law can be summarized as follows: 80% of the outputs result from 20% of the inputs.
highlights.selected_text: 80% of the outputs result from 20% of the inputs

highlights.representative_text: What 20% of sources are causing 80% of my problems and unhappiness? What 20% of sources are resulting in 80% of my desired outcome and happiness?
highlights.selected_text: What 20% of sources are causing 80% of my problems and unhappiness? What 20% of sources are resulting in 80% of my desired outcome and happiness?

highlights.representative_text: On a micro task level, limit the number of items on your to-do list and use impossibly short deadlines to force immediate action while ignoring minutiae.
highlights.selected_text: use impossibly short deadlines to force immediate action while ignoring minutiae.

highlights.representative_text: Don't ever arrive at the office or in front of your computer without a clear list of priorities.
highlights.selected_text: Don't ever arrive at the office or in front of your computer without a clear list of priorities

highlights.representative_text: Parkinson's Law dictates that a task will swell in (perceived) importance and complexity in relation to the time allotted for its completion. It is the magic of the imminent deadline. If I give you 24 hours to complete a project, the time pressure forces you to focus on execution, and you have no choice but to do only the bare essentials.
highlights.selected_text: Parkinson's Law dictates that a task will swell in (perceived) importance and complexity in relation to the time allotted for its completion. It is the magic of the imminent deadline. If I give you 24 hours to complete a project, the time pressure forces you to focus on execution, and you have no choice but to do only the bare essentials

highlights.representative_text: But you are the average of the five people you associate with most, so do not underestimate the effects of your pessimistic, unambitious, or disorganized friends.
highlights.selected_text: But you are the average of the five people you associate with most, so do not underestimate the effects of your pessimistic, unambitious, or disorganized friends

highlights.representative_text: Being busy is a form of laziness--lazy thinking and indiscriminate action.
highlights.selected_text: Being busy is a form of laziness--lazy thinking and indiscriminate action.

highlights.representative_text: From this moment forward, remember this: What you do is infinitely more important than how you do it. Efficiency is still important, but it is useless unless applied to the right things.
highlights.selected_text: What you do is infinitely more important than how you do it. Efficiency is still important, but it is useless unless applied to the right things.

highlights.representative_text: The best solution is to use both together: Identify the few critical tasks that contribute most to income and schedule them with very short and clear deadlines.
highlights.selected_text: The best solution is to use both together: Identify the few critical tasks that contribute most to income and schedule them with very short and clear deadlines.

highlights.representative_text: Make no mistake, maximum income from minimal necessary effort (including minimum number of customers) is the primary goal.
highlights.selected_text: maximum income from minimal necessary effort (including minimum number of customers) is the primary goal

highlights.representative_text: Being selective--doing less--is the path of the productive. Focus on the important few and ignore the rest.
highlights.selected_text: Being selective--doing less--is the path of the productive. Focus on the important few and ignore the rest

highlights.representative_text: Shorten schedules and deadlines to necessitate focused action instead of deliberation and procrastination.
highlights.selected_text: Shorten schedules and deadlines to necessitate focused action instead of deliberation and procrastination.

highlights.representative_text: Doing something unimportant well does not make it important. Requiring a lot of time does not make a task important.
highlights.selected_text: Doing something unimportant well does not make it important. Requiring a lot of time does not make a task important.

highlights.representative_text: The world has agreed to shuffle papers between 9:00 A.M. and 5:00 P.M., and since you're trapped in the office for that period of servitude, you are compelled to create activities to fill that time.
highlights.selected_text: The world has agreed to shuffle papers between 9:00 A.M. and 5:00 P.M., and since you're trapped in the office for that period of servitude, you are compelled to create activities to fill that time

highlights.representative_text: I only read the sections of the book that were relevant to immediate next steps, which took less than two hours.
highlights.selected_text: I only read the sections of the book that were relevant to immediate next steps, which took less than two hours

highlights.representative_text: If the task is how-to in nature, I only read accounts that are "how I did it" and autobiographical.
highlights.selected_text: how I did it" and autobiographical

highlights.representative_text: How to Read 200% Faster in 10 Minutes
highlights.selected_text: How to Read 200% Faster in 10 Minutes

highlights.representative_text: Hence, a wealth of information creates a poverty of attention and a need to allocate that attention efficiently among the overabundance of information sources that might consume it.
highlights.selected_text: Hence, a wealth of information creates a poverty of attention and a need to allocate that attention efficiently among the overabundance of information sources that might consume it.

highlights.representative_text: It is imperative that you learn to ignore or redirect all information and interruptions that are irrelevant, unimportant, or unactionable. Most are all three. The first step is to develop and maintain a low-information diet.
highlights.selected_text: is imperative that you learn to ignore or redirect all information and interruptions that are irrelevant, unimportant, or unactionable. Most are all three. The first step is to develop and maintain a low-information diet

highlights.representative_text: I read the front-page headlines through the newspaper machines as I walk to lunch each day and nothing more. In five years, I haven't had a single problem due to this selective ignorance. It gives you something new to ask the rest of the population in lieu of small talk: "Tell me, what's new in the world?" And, if it's that important, you'll hear people talking about it. Using my crib notes approach to world affairs, I also retain more than someone who loses the forest for the trees in a sea of extraneous details.
highlights.selected_text: I read the front-page headlines through the newspaper machines as I walk to lunch each day and nothing more. In five years, I haven't had a single problem due to this selective ignorance. It gives you something new to ask the rest of the population in lieu of small talk: "Tell me, what's new in the world?" And, if it's that important, you'll hear people talking about it. Using my crib notes approach to world affairs, I also retain more than someone who loses the forest for the trees in a sea of extraneous details

highlights.representative_text: The world doesn't even hiccup, much less end, when you cut the information umbilical cord.
highlights.selected_text: The world doesn't even hiccup, much less end, when you cut the information umbilical cord

highlights.representative_text: Interrupting Interruption and theArt of Refusal
highlights.selected_text: Interrupting Interruption and theArt of Refusal

highlights.representative_text: The office phone should be put on silent mode and allowed to go to voicemail at all times.
highlights.selected_text: The office phone should be put on silent mode and allowed to go to voicemail at all times

highlights.representative_text: More is not better, and stopping something is often 10 times better than finishing it.
highlights.selected_text: More is not better, and stopping something is often 10 times better than finishing it.

highlights.representative_text: The cubicle is your temple--don't permit casual visitors.
highlights.selected_text: The cubicle is your temple--don't permit casual visitors

highlights.representative_text: It is a matter of limiting access and funneling all communication toward immediate action.
highlights.selected_text: It is a matter of limiting access and funneling all communication toward immediate action.

highlights.representative_text: First, limit e-mail consumption and production. This is the greatest single interruption in the modern world. Turn off the audible alert if you have one on Outlook or a similar program and turn off automatic send/receive, which delivers e-mail to your inbox as soon as someone sends them. Check e-mail twice per day, once at 12:00 noon or just prior to lunch, and again at 4:00 P.M. 12:00 P.M. and 4:00 P.M. are times that ensure you will have the most responses from previously sent e-mail. Never check e-mail first thing in the morning.12Instead, complete your most important task before 11:00 A.M. to avoid using lunch or reading e-mail as a postponement excuse.
highlights.selected_text: First, limit e-mail consumption and production. This is the greatest single interruption in the modern world. Turn off the audible alert if you have one on Outlook or a similar program and turn off automatic send/receive, which delivers e-mail to your inbox as soon as someone sends them. Check e-mail twice per day, once at 12:00 noon or just prior to lunch, and again at 4:00 P.M. 12:00 P.M. and 4:00 P.M. are times that ensure you will have the most responses from previously sent e-mail. Never check e-mail first thing in the morning.12Instead, complete your most important task before 11:00 A.M. to avoid using lunch or reading e-mail as a postponement excuse.

highlights.representative_text: That sounds doable. So I can best prepare, can you please send me an e-mail with an agenda? That is, the topics and questions we'll need to address? That would be great. Thanks in advance. Don't give them a chance to bail out. The "thanks in advance" before a retort increases your chances of getting the e-mail.
highlights.selected_text: That sounds doable. So I can best prepare, can you please send me an e-mail with an agenda? That is, the topics and questions we'll need to address? That would be great. Thanks in advance. Don't give them a chance to bail out. The "thanks in advance" before a retort increases your chances of getting the e-mail

highlights.representative_text: If headphone games aren't your thing, the reflexive response to an invader should be the same as when answering the cell phone: "Hi, invader. I'm right in the middle of something. How can I be of help?" If it's not clear within 30 seconds, ask the person to send you an e-mail about the chosen issue; do not offer to send them an e-mail first: "I'll be happy to help, but I have to finish this first. Can you send me a quick e-mail to remind me?" If you still cannot deflect an invader, give the person a time limit on your availability, which can also be used for phone conversations: "OK, I only have two minutes before a call, but what's the situation and what can I do to help?"
highlights.selected_text: Hi, invader. I'm right in the middle of something. How can I be of help?" If it's not clear within 30 seconds, ask the person to send you an e-mail about the chosen issue; do not offer to send them an e-mail first: "I'll be happy to help, but I have to finish this first. Can you send me a quick e-mail to remind me?"

highlights.representative_text: Jane: No, I have a minute. What can I do for you?
highlights.selected_text: No, I have a minute. What can I do for you?

highlights.representative_text: Jane: Hi, John. I'm right in the middle of something. How can I help you out?
highlights.selected_text: Hi, John. I'm right in the middle of something. How can I help you out?

highlights.representative_text: Here is a simple e-mail template that can be used:
highlights.selected_text: Here is a simple e-mail template that can be used

highlights.representative_text: From this moment forward, resolve to keep those around you focused and avoid all meetings, whether in person or remote, that do not have clear objectives.
highlights.selected_text: avoid all meetings, whether in person or remote, that do not have clear objectives

highlights.representative_text: Common time wasters include meetings, discussions, phone calls, web surfing, and e-mail that are unimportant.
highlights.selected_text: Common time wasters include meetings, discussions, phone calls, web surfing, and e-mail that are unimportant

highlights.representative_text: Cite other commitments at odd times to make them more believable (e.g., 3:20 vs. 3:30) and force people to focus instead of socializing, commiserating, and digressing. If you must join a meeting that is scheduled to last a long time or that is open-ended, inform the organizer that you would like permission to cover your portion first, as you have a commitment in 15 minutes.
highlights.selected_text: Cite other commitments at odd times to make them more believable (e.g., 3:20 vs. 3:30) and force people to focus instead of socializing, commiserating, and digressing. If you must join a meeting that is scheduled to last a long time or that is open-ended, inform the organizer that you would like permission to cover your portion first, as you have a commitment in 15 minutes.

highlights.representative_text: Use the cell number in the e-mail autoresponse and answer it at all times unless it is an unknown caller or it is a call you don't want to answer. If in doubt, allow the call to go to voicemail and listen to the voicemail immediately afterward to gauge importance. If it can wait, let it wait. The offending parties have to learn to wait.
highlights.selected_text: Use the cell number in the e-mail autoresponse and answer it at all times unless it is an unknown caller or it is a call you don't want to answer. If in doubt, allow the call to go to voicemail and listen to the voicemail immediately afterward to gauge importance. If it can wait, let it wait. The offending parties have to learn to wait.

highlights.representative_text: The third step is to master the art of refusal and avoiding meetings.
highlights.selected_text: The third step is to master the art of refusal and avoiding meetings.

highlights.representative_text: Remember one of our ten commandments: Beg for forgiveness; don't ask for permission.
highlights.selected_text: Beg for forgiveness; don't ask for permission.

highlights.representative_text: Don't encourage people to chitchat and don't let them chitchat. Get them to the point immediately. If they meander or try to postpone for a later undefined call, reel them in and get them to come to the point. If they go into a long description of a problem, cut in with, "[Name], sorry to interrupt, but I have a call in five minutes. What can I do to help out?" You might instead say, "[Name], sorry to interrupt, but I have a call in five minutes. Can you send me an e-mail?"
highlights.selected_text: Don't encourage people to chitchat and don't let them chitchat. Get them to the point immediately. If they meander or try to postpone for a later undefined call, reel them in and get them to come to the point. If they go into a long description of a problem, cut in with, "[Name], sorry to interrupt, but I have a call in five minutes. What can I do to help out?" You might instead say, "[Name], sorry to interrupt, but I have a call in five minutes. Can you send me an e-mail?"

highlights.representative_text: Speaking of 30 minutes, if you absolutely cannot stop a meeting or call from happening, define the end time. Do not leave these discussions open-ended, and keep them short.
highlights.selected_text: Speaking of 30 minutes, if you absolutely cannot stop a meeting or call from happening, define the end time. Do not leave these discussions open-ended, and keep them short

highlights.representative_text: Don't suffer fools or you'll become one. It is your job to train those around you to be effective and efficient. No one else will do it for you.
highlights.selected_text: Don't suffer fools or you'll become one. It is your job to train those around you to be effective and efficient. No one else will do it for you.

highlights.representative_text: would become "Can you meet at 4:00 P.M.? If so If not, please advise three other times that work for you."
highlights.selected_text: Can you meet at 4:00 P.M.? If so If not, please advise three other times that work for you."

highlights.representative_text: Decide that, given the non-urgent nature of most issues, you will steer people toward the following means of communication, in order of preference: e-mail, phone, and in-person meetings.
highlights.selected_text: Decide that, given the non-urgent nature of most issues, you will steer people toward the following means of communication, in order of preference: e-mail, phone, and in-person meetings

highlights.representative_text: SET THE RULES in your favor: Limit access to your time, force people to define their requests before spending time with them, and batch routine menial tasks to prevent postponement of more important projects. Do not let people interrupt you. Find your focus and you'll find your lifestyle.
highlights.selected_text: Limit access to your time, force people to define their requests before spending time with them, and batch routine menial tasks to prevent postponement of more important projects. Do not let people interrupt you. Find your focus and you'll find your lifestyle

highlights.representative_text: It's amazing how someone's IQ seems to double as soon as you give them responsibility and indicate that you trust them.
highlights.selected_text: It's amazing how someone's IQ seems to double as soon as you give them responsibility and indicate that you trust them

highlights.representative_text: People are smarter than you think. Give them a chance to prove themselves.
highlights.selected_text: People are smarter than you think. Give them a chance to prove themselves

highlights.representative_text: Do not work harder when the solution is working smarter.
highlights.selected_text: Do not work harder when the solution is working smarter

highlights.representative_text: Empower others to act without interrupting you.
highlights.selected_text: Empower others to act without interrupting you.

highlights.representative_text: There is a psychological switching of gears that can require up to 45 minutes to resume a major task that has been interrupted.
highlights.selected_text: There is a psychological switching of gears that can require up to 45 minutes to resume a major task that has been interrupted

highlights.representative_text: Before this conversation, develop a number of "rules" like the previous example that would allow you to work more autonomously with less approval-seeking.
highlights.selected_text: Before this conversation, develop a number of "rules" like the previous example that would allow you to work more autonomously with less approval-seeking.

highlights.representative_text: There is an inescapable setup time for all tasks, large or minuscule in scale. It is often the same for one as it is for a hundred.
highlights.selected_text: There is an inescapable setup time for all tasks, large or minuscule in scale. It is often the same for one as it is for a hundred

highlights.representative_text: Meetings should only be held to make decisions about a predefined situation, not to define the problem.
highlights.selected_text: Meetings should only be held to make decisions about a predefined situation, not to define the problem

highlights.representative_text: That is, what tasks (whether laundry, groceries, mail, payments, or sales reporting, for example) can I allot to a specific time each day, week, month, quarter, or year so that I don't squander time repeating them more often than is absolutely necessary?
highlights.selected_text: can I allot to a specific time each day, week, month, quarter, or year so that I don't squander time repeating them more often than is absolutely necessary?

highlights.representative_text: Remember, profit is only profitable to the extent that you can use it. For that you need time.
highlights.selected_text: Remember, profit is only profitable to the extent that you can use it. For that you need time.

highlights.representative_text: Potential questions to decline include the following: Do you have a minute? Want to see a movie tonight/tomorrow? Can you help me with X? "No" should be your default answer to all requests.
highlights.selected_text: Potential questions to decline include the following: Do you have a minute? Want to see a movie tonight/tomorrow? Can you help me with X? "No" should be your default answer to all requests

highlights.representative_text: Go in with a clear set of objectives. Set an end time or leave early.
highlights.selected_text: Go in with a clear set of objectives. Set an end time or leave early

highlights.representative_text: Repeat this routine and ensure that you achieve more outside of the meeting than the attendees do within it; repeat the disappearing act as often as possible and cite improved productivity to convert this slowly into a permanent routine change.
highlights.selected_text: repeat the disappearing act as often as possible and cite improved productivity to convert this slowly into a permanent routine change

highlights.representative_text: Getting calls while stuck in a time-wasting meeting? No problem: Respond to voicemails via SMS during the meeting so you're not stuck returning calls afterward.
highlights.selected_text: Getting calls while stuck in a time-wasting meeting? No problem: Respond to voicemails via SMS during the meeting so you're not stuck returning calls afterward.

highlights.representative_text: There are many upmarket clinics set up for "expats" and health travelers in Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Goa, etc., with English-speaking dentists.

highlights.representative_text: Get the autoresponse and voicemail script in place now, and master the various methods of evasion. Replace the habit of "How are you?" with "How can I help you?" Get specific and remember--no stories. Focus on immediate actions.
highlights.selected_text: Get the autoresponse and voicemail script in place now, and master the various methods of evasion. Replace the habit of "How are you?" with "How can I help you?" Get specific and remember--no stories. Focus on immediate actions

highlights.representative_text: They're up against a hungry, polite, Excel-proficient Indian army.
highlights.selected_text: They're up against a hungry, polite, Excel-proficient Indian army.

highlights.representative_text: Develop the habit of nonfinishing that which is boring or unproductive if a boss isn't demanding it.
highlights.selected_text: Develop the habit of nonfinishing that which is boring or unproductive if a boss isn't demanding it.

highlights.representative_text: I let other dependable people synthesize hundreds of hours and thousands of pages of media for me. It was like having dozens of personal information assistants, and I didn't have to pay them a single cent.
highlights.selected_text: let other dependable people synthesize hundreds of hours and thousands of pages of media for me. It was like having dozens of personal information assistants, and I didn't have to pay them a single cent.

highlights.representative_text: No speculators or wannabes are worth the time.
highlights.selected_text: No speculators or wannabes are worth the time.

highlights.representative_text: Remember--unless something is well-defined and important, no one should do it.
highlights.selected_text: Remember--unless something is well-defined and important, no one should do it.

highlights.representative_text: If you spend your time, worth $20-25 per hour, doing something that someone else will do for $10 per hour, it's simply a poor use of resources.
highlights.selected_text: If you spend your time, worth $20-25 per hour, doing something that someone else will do for $10 per hour, it's simply a poor use of resources

highlights.representative_text: The first option is to assign personal items. Time is time, and if you're spending time on chores and errands that could be spent better elsewhere, a VA will improve life and the management learning curve is similar. Second, you can delegate business tasks that don't include financial information or identify your company.
highlights.selected_text: The first option is to assign personal items. Time is time, and if you're spending time on chores and errands that could be spent better elsewhere, a VA will improve life and the management learning curve is similar. Second, you can delegate business tasks that don't include financial information or identify your company.

highlights.representative_text: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
highlights.selected_text: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.

highlights.representative_text: Eliminate before you delegate.
highlights.selected_text: Eliminate before you delegate.

highlights.representative_text: Never automate something that can be eliminated, and never delegate something that can be automated or streamlined.
highlights.selected_text: Never automate something that can be eliminated, and never delegate something that can be automated or streamlined.

highlights.representative_text: If you still cannot deflect an invader, give the person a time limit on your availability, which can also be used for phone conversations: "OK, I only have two minutes before a call, but what's the situation and what can I do to help?"
highlights.selected_text: OK, I only have two minutes before a call, but what's the situation and what can I do to help?"

highlights.representative_text: Because the goal is to free your time to focus on bigger and better things.
highlights.selected_text: Because the goal is to free your time to focus on bigger and better things.

highlights.representative_text: Two Minutes: Use a pen or finger to trace under each line as you read as fast as possible.
highlights.selected_text: Use a pen or finger to trace under each line as you read as fast as possible

highlights.representative_text: It's not enough to use information for "something"--it needs to be immediate and important. If "no" on either count, don't consume it. Information is useless if it is not applied to something important or if you will forget it before you have a chance to apply it.
highlights.selected_text: It's not enough to use information for "something"--it needs to be immediate and important. If "no" on either count, don't consume it. Information is useless if it is not applied to something important or if you will forget it before you have a chance to apply it

highlights.representative_text: Using people to leverage a refined process multiplies production; using people as a solution to a poor process multiplies problems.
highlights.selected_text: using people as a solution to a poor process multiplies problems.

highlights.representative_text: Increased output necessitates decreased input.
highlights.selected_text: Increased output necessitates decreased input

highlights.representative_text: Fun things happen when you earn dollars, live on pesos, and compensate in rupees, but that's just the beginning.
highlights.selected_text: Fun things happen when you earn dollars, live on pesos, and compensate in rupees, but that's just the beginning

highlights.representative_text: For the entrepreneur, the goal is to grant as much information and independent decision-making ability to employees or contractors as possible.
highlights.selected_text: For the entrepreneur, the goal is to grant as much information and independent decision-making ability to employees or contractors as possible.

highlights.representative_text: Recall our mantra: Eliminate before you delegate.
highlights.selected_text: Eliminate before you delegate

highlights.representative_text: As cool as it is to say that you have people working for you in three countries, it's uncool to spend time babysitting people who are supposed to make your life easier.
highlights.selected_text: As cool as it is to say that you have people working for you in three countries, it's uncool to spend time babysitting people who are supposed to make your life easier.

highlights.representative_text: Golden Rule #1: Each delegated task must be both time-consuming and well-defined.
highlights.selected_text: Each delegated task must be both time-consuming and well-defined

highlights.representative_text: Request a status update after a few hours of work on a task to ensure that the task is both understood and achievable. Some tasks are, after initial attempts, impossible.
highlights.selected_text: Request a status update after a few hours of work on a task to ensure that the task is both understood and achievable. Some tasks are, after initial attempts, impossible.

highlights.representative_text: Never use debit cards for online transactions or with remote assistants. Reversing unauthorized credit card charges, particularly with American Express, is painless and near instantaneous.
highlights.selected_text: Never use debit cards for online transactions or with remote assistants. Reversing unauthorized credit card charges, particularly with American Express, is painless and near instantaneous

highlights.representative_text: One can give the remote personal assistant in India their assignment when they are leaving work at the end of the day in New York City, and they will have the presentation ready the next morning. Because of the time difference with India, assistants can work on it while they are asleep and have it back in their morning. When they wake up, they will find the completed summary in their inbox.

Because of the time difference with India, assistants can work on it while they are asleep and have it back in their morning. When they wake up, they will find the completed summary in their inbox

highlights.representative_text: So I hit send, but it's delayed to arrive later in the evening or at 8 A.M. when my employees arrive the next day. This is how e-mail was meant to be! It's mail, not a chat service.
highlights.selected_text: but it's delayed to arrive later in the evening or at 8 A.M. when my employees arrive the next day. This is how e-mail was meant to be! It's mail, not a chat service.

highlights.representative_text: Multiply this by 10 and we have $1673.80 in profit for 30 minutes of work. Doug is making $3,347.60 per hour and purchases no product in advance. His initial start-up costs were $1,200 for the webpage design, which he recouped in the first week.
highlights.selected_text: Multiply this by 10 and we have $1673.80 in profit for 30 minutes of work. Doug is making $3,347.60 per hour and purchases no product in advance. His initial start-up costs were $1,200 for the webpage design, which he recouped in the first week

highlights.representative_text: Those companies mail the products to Doug's customers--this is called drop-shipping--and Doug pays the manufacturers as little as 45% of the retail price of the products up to 90 days later (net-90 terms).
highlights.selected_text: Those companies mail the products to Doug's customers--this is called drop-shipping--and Doug pays the manufacturers as little as 45% of the retail price of the products up to 90 days later

highlights.representative_text: This chapter is not for people who want to run businesses but for those who want to own businesses and spend no time on them.
highlights.selected_text: This chapter is not for people who want to run businesses but for those who want to own businesses and spend no time on them.

highlights.representative_text: If starting from scratch, ignore service businesses for now, as constant customer contact makes absence difficult.21
highlights.selected_text: If starting from scratch, ignore service businesses for now, as constant customer contact makes absence difficult

highlights.representative_text: Our goal is simple: to create an automated vehicle for generating cash without consuming time. That's it.22 I will call this vehicle a "muse" whenever possible to separate it from the ambiguous term "business," which can refer to a lemonade stand or a Fortune 10 oil conglomerate--our objective is more limited and thus requires a more precise label.
highlights.selected_text: Our goal is simple: to create an automated vehicle for generating cash without consuming time. That's it.22 I will call this vehicle a "muse" whenever possible to separate it from the ambiguous term "business,

highlights.representative_text: It works like this: Reseller A sells the product for your recommended advertised price of $50, then reseller B sells it for $45 to compete with A, and then C sells it for $40 to compete with A and B. In no time at all, no one is making profit from selling your product and reorders disappear. Customers are now accustomed to the lower pricing and the process is irreversible. The product is dead and you need to create a new product. This is precisely the reason why so many companies need to create new product after new product month after month. It's a headache.
highlights.selected_text: It works like this: Reseller A sells the product for your recommended advertised price of $50, then reseller B sells it for $45 to compete with A, and then C sells it for $40 to compete with A and B. In no time at all, no one is making profit from selling your product and reorders disappear. Customers are now accustomed to the lower pricing and the process is irreversible. The product is dead and you need to create a new product. This is precisely the reason why so many companies need to create new product after new product month after month. It's a headache

highlights.representative_text: Creating demand is hard. Filling demand is much easier. Don't create a product, then seek someone to sell it to. Find a market--define your customers--then find or develop a product for them.
highlights.selected_text: reating demand is hard. Filling demand is much easier. Don't create a product, then seek someone to sell it to. Find a market--define your customers--then find or develop a product for them

highlights.representative_text: If you focus on how to train German shepherds or a restoration product for antique Fords, on the other hand, the market and competition shrink, making it less expensive to reach your customers and easier to charge premium pricing.
highlights.selected_text: If you focus on how to train German shepherds or a restoration product for antique Fords, on the other hand, the market and competition shrink, making it less expensive to reach your customers and easier to charge premium pricing.

highlights.representative_text: It is said that if everyone is your customer, then no one is your customer. If you start off aiming to sell a product to dog- or car-lovers, stop. It's expensive to advertise to such a broad market, and you are competing with too many products and too much free information.
highlights.selected_text: It is said that if everyone is your customer, then no one is your customer. If you start off aiming to sell a product to dog- or car-lovers, stop. It's expensive to advertise to such a broad market, and you are competing with too many products and too much free information

highlights.representative_text: The goal is come up with well-formed product ideas and spend nothing; in Step 3, we will create advertising for them and test responses from real customers before investing in manufacturing. There are several criteria that ensure the end product will fit into an automated architecture.
highlights.selected_text: The goal is come up with well-formed product ideas and spend nothing; in Step 3, we will create advertising for them and test responses from real customers before investing in manufacturing. There are several criteria that ensure the end product will fit into an automated architecture.

highlights.representative_text: The main benefit of your product should be explainable in one sentence or phrase.
highlights.selected_text: The main benefit of your product should be explainable in one sentence or phrase

highlights.representative_text: Pricing low is shortsighted, because someone else is always willing to sacrifice more profit margin and drive you both bankrupt.
highlights.selected_text: Pricing low is shortsighted, because someone else is always willing to sacrifice more profit margin and drive you both bankrupt

highlights.representative_text: I personally aim for an 8-10x markup, which means a $100 product can't cost me more than $10-12.50.27 If I had used the commonly recommended 5 x markup with BrainQUICKEN, it would have gone bankrupt within 6 months due to a dishonest supplier and late magazine.
highlights.selected_text: I personally aim for an 8-10x markup, which means a $100 product can't cost me more than $10-12.50.27

highlights.representative_text: I will not pursue any product that takes more than three to four weeks to manufacture, and I recommend aiming for one to two weeks from order placement to shippable product.
highlights.selected_text: I will not pursue any product that takes more than three to four weeks to manufacture, and I recommend aiming for one to two weeks from order placement to shippable product.

highlights.representative_text: Purchasing an existing product at wholesale and reselling it is the easiest route but also the least profitable. It is the fastest to set up but the fastest to die off due to price competition with other resellers.
highlights.selected_text: rchasing an existing product at wholesale and reselling it is the easiest route but also the least profitable.

highlights.representative_text: The band KISS made millions in record and concert sales, but the real profit has been in licensing--granting others the right to produce hundreds of products with their name and image in exchange for a percentage of sales.
highlights.selected_text: licensing--granting others the right to produce hundreds of products with their name and image in exchange for a percentage of sales.

highlights.representative_text: The other side of the equation is the person interested in manufacturing and selling the inventor's product for 90-97% of the profit: the licensee. This is, for me and most NR, more interesting.
highlights.selected_text: The other side of the equation is the person interested in manufacturing and selling the inventor's product for 90-97% of the profit: the licensee. This is, for me and most NR, more interesting.

highlights.representative_text: The new mantra is this: Work wherever and whenever you want, but get your work done.
highlights.selected_text: Work wherever and whenever you want, but get your work done.

highlights.representative_text: We need to ask for an inch and turn it into a foot without setting off panic alarms.
highlights.selected_text: We need to ask for an inch and turn it into a foot without setting off panic alarms

highlights.representative_text: Confirming Sufficient Market Size
highlights.selected_text: Confirming Sufficient Market Size

highlights.representative_text: While entrepreneurs have the most trouble with Automation, since they fear giving up control, employees get stuck on Liberation because they fear taking control.
highlights.selected_text: entrepreneurs have the most trouble with Automation, since they fear giving up control, employees get stuck on Liberation because they fear taking control

highlights.representative_text: Creation is a better means of self-expression than possession; it is through creating, not possessing, that life is revealed.
highlights.selected_text: Creation is a better means of self-expression than possession; it is through creating, not possessing, that life is revealed.

highlights.representative_text: To get an accurate indicator of commercial viability, don't ask people if they would buy--ask them to buy. The response to the second is the only one that matters. The approach of the NR reflects this.
highlights.selected_text: To get an accurate indicator of commercial viability, don't ask people if they would buy--ask them to buy. The response to the second is the only one that matters. The approach of the NR reflects this

highlights.representative_text: Don't be melodramatic when there is no need--few things are fatal, particularly for smart people. If you've made it this far in life, losing or dropping a job will often be little more than a few weeks of vacation (unless you want more) prior to something better.
highlights.selected_text: Don't be melodramatic when there is no need--few things are fatal, particularly for smart people. If you've made it this far in life, losing or dropping a job will often be little more than a few weeks of vacation (unless you want more) prior to something better.

highlights.representative_text: The alternative to binge travel--the mini-retirement--entails relocating to one place for one to six months before going home or moving to another locale. It is the anti-vacation in the most positive sense. Though it can be relaxing, the mini-retirement is not an escape from your life but a reexamination of it--the creation of a blank slate. Following elimination and automation, what would you be escaping from? Rather than seeking to see the world through photo ops between foreign-but-familiar hotels, we aim to experience it at a speed that lets it change us.
highlights.selected_text: The alternative to binge travel--the mini-retirement--entails relocating to one place for one to six months before going home or moving to another locale. It is the anti-vacation in the most positive sense. Though it can be relaxing, the mini-retirement is not an escape from your life but a reexamination of it--the creation of a blank slate. Following elimination and automation, what would you be escaping from? Rather than seeking to see the world through photo ops between foreign-but-familiar hotels, we aim to experience it at a speed that lets it change us.

highlights.representative_text: Choose a starting point and then wander until you find your second home.
highlights.selected_text: Choose a starting point and then wander until you find your second home

highlights.representative_text: Let's face it, though: There are tons of things in your home and life that you don't use, need, or even particularly want.
highlights.selected_text: There are tons of things in your home and life that you don't use, need, or even particularly want

highlights.representative_text: What is the 20% of my belongings that I use 80% of the time?
highlights.selected_text: What is the 20% of my belongings that I use 80% of the time?

highlights.representative_text: Most of this can be overcome as soon as we recognize it for what it is: outdated comparisons using the more-is-better and money-as-success mind-sets that got us into trouble to begin with.
highlights.selected_text: outdated comparisons using the more-is-better and money-as-success mind-sets that got us into trouble to begin with

highlights.representative_text: I used Craigslist's "Free" category to get rid of four years of accumulated possessions in less than three hours on a Saturday evening.
highlights.selected_text: I used Craigslist's "Free" category to get rid of four years of accumulated possessions in less than three hours on a Saturday evening.

highlights.representative_text: The different surroundings act as a counterpoint and mirror for your own prejudices, making weaknesses that much easier to fix. I rarely travel somewhere without deciding first how I'll obsess on a specific skill.
highlights.selected_text: fix. I rarely travel somewhere without deciding first how I'll obsess on a specific skill

highlights.representative_text: The "meaning" of "life" question is unanswerable without further elaboration.
highlights.selected_text: The "meaning" of "life" question is unanswerable without further elaboration.

highlights.representative_text: Then I realized: You don't have to make money back the same way you lose it. If you lose $1,000 at the blackjack table, should you try and recoup it there? Of course not. I don't want to deal with renters, even with a property management company. The solution: Leave the house alone, use it on occasion, and just create incoming revenue elsewhere that would cover the cost of the mortgage through consulting, publishing, etc.

highlights.representative_text: Adversity doesn't build character; it reveals it.
highlights.selected_text: Adversity doesn't build character; it reveals it.

highlights.representative_text: Don't accept large or costly favors from strangers. This karmic debt will come back to haunt you. If you can't pass it up, immediately return to karmic neutrality with a gift of your choosing. Repay it before they set the terms for you.
highlights.selected_text: Don't accept large or costly favors from strangers. This karmic debt will come back to haunt you. If you can't pass it up, immediately return to karmic neutrality with a gift of your choosing. Repay it before they set the terms for you

highlights.representative_text: Even when you're not traveling the world, develop the habit of letting small bad things happen. If you don't, you'll never find time for the life-changing big things, whether important tasks or true peak experiences.
highlights.selected_text: Even when you're not traveling the world, develop the habit of letting small bad things happen. If you don't, you'll never find time for the life-changing big things

highlights.representative_text: Too many choices = less or no productivity Too many choices = less or no appreciation Too many choices = sense of overwhelm
highlights.selected_text: Too many choices = less or no productivity Too many choices = less or no appreciation Too many choices = sense of overwhelm

highlights.representative_text: Therefore, I manipulate the environmental causes of poor responses instead of depending on error-prone self-discipline.
highlights.selected_text: I manipulate the environmental causes of poor responses instead of depending on error-prone self-discipline

highlights.representative_text: Related: Money doesn't change you; it reveals who you are when you no longer have to be nice.
highlights.selected_text: Money doesn't change you; it reveals who you are when you no longer have to be nice.

highlights.representative_text: Rehearse poverty regularly--restrict even moderate expenses for 1-2 weeks and give away 20%+ of minimally used clothing--so you can think big and take "risks" without fear (Seneca). A mindset of scarcity (which breeds jealousy and unethical behavior) is due to a disdain for those things easily obtained (Seneca).

A mindset of scarcity (which breeds jealousy and unethical behavior) is due to a disdain for those things easily obtained (Seneca).

highlights.representative_text: Do not let people ramble. Forget "How's it going?" when someone calls you. Stick with "What's up?" or "I'm in the middle of getting something out, but what's going on?" A big part of GTD (Getting Things Done) is GTP--Getting To the Point.
highlights.selected_text: Do not let people ramble. Forget "How's it going?" when someone calls you. Stick with "What's up?" or "I'm in the middle of getting something out, but what's going on?" A big part of GTD (Getting Things Done) is GTP--Getting To the Point.

highlights.representative_text: Do not agree to meetings or calls with no clear agenda or end time. If the desired outcome is defined clearly with a stated objective and agenda listing topics/questions to cover, no meeting or call should last more than 30 minutes. Request them in advance so you "can best prepare and make good use of the time together."
highlights.selected_text: Do not agree to meetings or calls with no clear agenda or end time. If the desired outcome is defined clearly with a stated objective and agenda listing topics/questions to cover, no meeting or call should last more than 30 minutes. Request them in advance so you "can best prepare and make good use of the time together

highlights.representative_text: If an acquaintance asks you if you want to come to their house for dinner next week, and you know you won't, don't say, "I'm not sure. I'll let you know next week." Instead, use something soft but conclusive like, "Next week? I'm pretty sure I have another commitment on Thursday, but thank you for the invite. Just so I don't leave you hanging, let's assume I can't make it, but can I let you know if that changes?" Decision made. Move on.
highlights.selected_text: If an acquaintance asks you if you want to come to their house for dinner next week, and you know you won't, don't say, "I'm not sure. I'll let you know next week." Instead, use something soft but conclusive like, "Next week? I'm pretty sure I have another commitment on Thursday, but thank you for the invite. Just so I don't leave you hanging, let's assume I can't make it, but can I let you know if that changes?" Decision made. Move on.

highlights.representative_text: Fast decisions preserve usable attention for what matters.
highlights.selected_text: Fast decisions preserve usable attention for what matters.

highlights.representative_text: Do not e-mail first thing in the morning or last thing at night. The former scrambles your priorities and plans for the day, and the latter just gives you insomnia.
highlights.selected_text: Do not e-mail first thing in the morning or last thing at night. The former scrambles your priorities and plans for the day, and the latter just gives you insomnia.

highlights.representative_text: In working with athletes, for example, it's clear that those who maintain the lowest bodyfat percentage eat the same foods over and over with little variation. I've eaten the same "slow-carb" breakfast and lunch for nearly two years,88 putting variation only into meals that I focus on for enjoyment: dinner and all meals on Saturdays.

highlights.representative_text: DECISION-MAKING ISN'T to be avoided--that's not the problem. Look at a good CEO or top corporate performer and you'll see a high volume of decisions. It's deliberation--the time we vacillate over and consider each decision--that's the attention consumer. Total deliberation time, not the number of decisions, determines your attention bank account balance (or debt).
highlights.selected_text: DECISION-MAKING ISN'T to be avoided--that's not the problem. Look at a good CEO or top corporate performer and you'll see a high volume of decisions. It's deliberation--the time we vacillate over and consider each decision--that's the attention consumer. Total deliberation time, not the number of decisions, determines your attention bank account balance

highlights.representative_text: There is no sure path to success, but the surest path to failure is trying to please everyone. Do an 80/20 analysis of your customer base in two ways--which 20% are producing 80%+ of my profit, and which 20% are consuming 80%+ of my time?
highlights.selected_text: There is no sure path to success, but the surest path to failure is trying to please everyone. Do an 80/20 analysis of your customer base in two ways--which 20% are producing 80%+ of my profit, and which 20% are consuming 80%+ of my time

highlights.representative_text: Don't manufacture product in large quantities to increase margin unless your product and marketing are tested and ready for rollout without changes. If a limited number of prototypes cost $10 per piece to manufacture and sell for $11 each, that's fine for the initial testing period, and essential for limiting downside. Sacrifice margin temporarily for the testing phase, if need be, and avoid potentially fatal upfront overcommitments.
highlights.selected_text: Don't manufacture product in large quantities to increase margin unless your product and marketing are tested and ready for rollout without changes. If a limited number of prototypes cost $10 per piece to manufacture and sell for $11 each, that's fine for the initial testing period, and essential for limiting downside. Sacrifice margin temporarily for the testing phase, if need be, and avoid potentially fatal upfront overcommitments

highlights.representative_text: Products can be fixed as long as you have cash flow, and bugs are forgiven, but missing deadlines is often fatal.
highlights.selected_text: missing deadlines is often fatal

highlights.representative_text: Remember, more customers isn't the goal; more profit is.
highlights.selected_text: more customers isn't the goal; more profit is.

highlights.representative_text: The financial goal of a start-up should be simple: profit in the least time with the least effort.
highlights.selected_text: profit in the least time with the least effort

highlights.representative_text: It's best to do this beforehand if possible--otherwise, you'll need to launch new or "premium" products--so plan distribution before setting pricing.
highlights.selected_text: It's best to do this beforehand if possible--otherwise, you'll need to launch new or "premium" products--so plan distribution before setting pricing

highlights.representative_text: Many companies will sell direct-to-consumer by necessity in early stages, only to realize that their margins can't accommodate resellers and distributors when they come knocking.
highlights.selected_text: Many companies will sell direct-to-consumer by necessity in early stages, only to realize that their margins can't accommodate resellers and distributors when they come knocking

highlights.representative_text: Calvin Coolidge once said that nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent; I would add that the second most common is smart people who think their IQ or resume justifies delivering late. --JUNE 24, 2008
highlights.selected_text: Calvin Coolidge once said that nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent; I would add that the second most common is smart people who think their IQ or resume justifies delivering late

highlights.representative_text: Avoid this scenario and consider partnering with one or two key distributors instead, using that exclusivity to negotiate better terms: less discounting, prepayment, preferred placement and marketing support, etc.
highlights.selected_text: consider partnering with one or two key distributors instead, using that exclusivity to negotiate better terms: less discounting, prepayment, preferred placement and marketing support, etc

highlights.representative_text: If someone asks to "jump on the phone" with me, send them something like: "To make the best use of everyone's time, Tim likes to have a well-defined agenda with objectives for a call before jumping on the phone. Can you please send over some bullet points with what you'd like to cover and decide on the call?" Something like that.
highlights.selected_text: If someone asks to "jump on the phone" with me, send them something like: "To make the best use of everyone's time, Tim likes to have a well-defined agenda with objectives for a call before jumping on the phone. Can you please send over some bullet points with what you'd like to cover and decide on the call?" Something like that.

highlights.representative_text: This requires you to launch a new product, as price erosion is almost always irreversible.
highlights.selected_text: as price erosion is almost always irreversible

highlights.representative_text: Try and "cluster" phone calls and meetings so that I can bang them out at the same time, as opposed to having one at 10 A.M., another at 1 P.M., and another at 4 P.M.
highlights.selected_text: Try and "cluster" phone calls and meetings so that I can bang them out at the same time
